page.title: 09TRADE IN STOCKPORT
page.content: { Stockport}has a large and very old { market.}The stallholders sell all sorts of things and they are much cheaper than the shops.{Market days} are{Friday and Saturday.} Near the market is the{town centre-} the{shopping precinct.}Here there are lots of{shops}and all the{big stores.} It is very{busy at weekends}but you can buy almost anything. Soon it will be even bigger and better because a Sainsbury's and an Asda are being built. People from all over the area come to shop in{Stockport}because{the shops { are so good.}It has plenty of car parks and if you have not got a car the bus and railway stations are only two minutes walk away.
